meta-review.comment: Baldur's Gate 3 sets a new standard for CRPGs with its crunchy, tactical combat, memorable story, complex characters, and highly polished cinematic presentation. The game rewards exploration and creativity, delivering an adventure beyond imagination. It excels in every area from music to graphics to story to gameplay, and it is arguably the best attempt at recreating the open-ended possibilities of tabletop gameplay within a video game to date. With its epic journey and great characters, Baldur's Gate 3 is a masterpiece of the RPG genre.
